text:
Peter Matić (24 March 1937 – 20 June 2019) was an Austrian actor and voice actor. He appeared in more than 80 movies and TV series between 1961 and 2019. He had roles in movies such as "I Learned It from Father" (1964), "Everyone Dies Alone" (1976) and "Wahnfried" (1986). He is known in German-speaking countries for dubbing the voice of British actor Ben Kingsley.
Matić was born in Vienna. He died on 20 June 2019, at the age of 82.
